name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Löded Diper: Intro to Diary of a Wimpy Kid
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Löded Diper: Intro to Diary of a Wimpy Kid
long_desc: Greg Heffley. The Cheese Touch. Ploopy. The Diary of a Wimpy Kid series by Jeff Kinney shaped the culture of an entire generation of preteens. Now, 12 years after the original Diary of a Wimpy Kid book was released, we take this time to reflect on not only on the nostalgia of middle school drama but also the chaos of coming of age. Zoo Wee Mama
